GrowlMail crashes Mail

 25 Feb 2009

Today when I upgraded to Safari 4 (beta) and after the two updates I installed, I tried launching Mail but it crashed with a “This application quit unexpectedly”, then it went on to blame the GrowlMail plugin. To fix this, I found this forum post on MacRumors. TheReason actually means to go into ~/Library/Mail/Bundles and remove GrowlMail.mailbundle.

This is a temporary fix as this (obviously) disables GrowlMail, but Mail launches. If you can put up with not receiving growl notifications every time you receive a notification you’ve won a lottery you didn’t enter, then go for it.
